mapper.insert: insert into bs_basedict(dict_code, dict_name, data_code, data_id, data_name, data_order, crtdate, crtuser) VALUES ('HPT001', 'APP首页分类', (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(data_code), 1) FROM bs_basedict WHERE dict_code ='HPT001'), (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(data_code) + 1, 1) FROM bs_basedict WHERE dict_code ='HPT001'), #{data.data_name}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(data_order) + 1, 1) FROM bs_basedict WHERE dict_code ='HPT001'), now(), #{data.crtuser})
mapper.update: update bs_basedict set data_name = #{data.data_name} where dict_id = #{data.dict_id}
mapper.select:
select dict_id, dict_name, data_code, data_name, dict_code, crtuser, date_format(crtdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') crtdate from bs_basedict where dict_code = 'HPT001'
and data_name like concat('%', #{params.data_name}, '%')
select dict_id, dict_name, data_name, data_code from bs_basedict where dict_code = 'HPT001' and dict_id = #{id}
